name: kDynamicEnvironment
description: Dynamic weather through random preset choosing.
author: Kodi022

Day-Night-Cycle.description: Lets the plugin control the day-night cycle. May update choppy compared to vanilla but allows more control

Day-Length.description: How long the day should take in minutes

Allow-Night.description: If the day/night cycle allows night time, skips to morning otherwise

Night-Length.description: How long the night should take in minutes

Use-Plugin-Weather.description: If weather should change. Disabling allows for manual env setting while keeping a custom day/night cycle. Doesnt not toggle water

Weather-Changes-Per-Day.description: Average time weather switches per day+night (Day+Night = 1h, ChangesPerDay = 4, ChangeTimeVariance = 10, 1h / 4 +- 10 = 5-25m)

Weather-Change-Minute-Variance.description: Adds or subtracts number minutes by number of Weather-Changes-Per-Day (see description of Weather-Changes-Per-Day to see the math)

Weather-Transition-Time.description: Minutes for weather to complete transitioning to another. Run faster to save cpu and network. You can set this much slower than the weather change speed, so it somewhat molds between different environments

Use-Plugin-Water.description: Lets plugin control water, allowing tides and flooding. Water is updated very slowly because it can cause lag when touching lots of bricks

Water-Default-Height.description: Height water will default to, 2 is 2x micro

Water-Tide-Range.description: Adds and removes given number of water height during certain times of day. 0 to disable, 2 is 2x micro

Water-Flood-Max.description: Max height floods can reach on top of default water height. 0 to disable, 2 is 2x micro (untested)

Continue-Weather-Dynvar-Reroll.description: Some environment presets have a few dynamic variables that randomly change each weather change, but will they reroll when weather continues (untested)

Enable-Broadcasts.description: Broadcasts for weather changing and possible other future uses

Use-Custom-Presets-File.description: If custom presets file is chose, which disables the use of the default one

commands.name: /env
commands.description: Command that is the control for Dynamic environment plugin

args.name: option
args.description: function to run on plugin, leave empty to see options
